Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION [Business_day_date](@DAY_NUMBER INT, @TZ_NAME NVARCHAR(50) = NULL) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN SELECT VALUE = CASE WHEN @DAY_NUMBER IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (SELECT value FROM [innovator].[ConvertFromLocal_Table]((SELECT DAY_DATE FROM BUSINESS_CALENDAR WHERE DAY_NUMBER = Abs(@DAY_NUMBER)), @TZ_NAME)) END
Item.name: Business_Day_Date
